name: Gobi Desert
hint: Vast rain-shadow desert spanning southern Mongolia and northern China

name: Thar Desert
hint: Most densely populated desert in the world, on the India-Pakistan border

name: Karakum Desert
hint: Black sand desert covering most of Turkmenistan, home to the 'Door to Hell' gas crater

name: Kyzylkum Desert
hint: Red sand desert between the Amu Darya and Syr Darya rivers in Central Asia

name: Taklamakan Desert
hint: Shifting sand desert in Xinjiang, China, surrounded by the ancient Silk Road routes

name: Arabian Desert
hint: Vast desert covering most of the Arabian Peninsula, one of the largest sand deserts

name: Rub' al Khali
hint: Known as the Empty Quarter, the largest continuous sand desert on Earth

name: Dasht-e Kavir
hint: Iran's Great Salt Desert, a vast plateau of salt marshes and mudflats

name: Dasht-e Lut
hint: Iranian desert holding the record for Earth's hottest surface temperature ever recorded

name: Negev Desert
hint: Desert occupying more than half of Israel's land area in the south
